Package org.lrdm.probes

package org.lrdm.probes
Package containing the probes offered by the framework to observe its execution. Currently offers MirrorProbe and LinkProbe.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.lrdm
    Package containing the domain classes of the simulator (e.g., Mirror and Link).
    org.lrdm.effectors
    Package containing the Effector to add Adaptation Action to the simulation.
    org.lrdm.examples
    Package containing example usages of the framework.
    org.lrdm.topologies
    Package containing topology strategies of the simulator.
    org.lrdm.util
    Package for utility classes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LinkProbe
    A probe observing links.
    MirrorProbe
    A probe to observe mirrors in an RDM network.
    Probe
    A Probe to observer an RDM Network.
